backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining restaurant, menu, order, and profile types with seeded Sakthi Snacks data and authorization-protected query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented features, affected files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files covering routing, hooks, components, pages, and cart logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration and app root handling layout, routes, authentication, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state with localStorage persistence and item operations.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart item structures used in the UI.
Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component blocking access to protected content unless the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a recovery UI with reset and refresh options.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: Image component that swaps to a fallback image on load failure and resets when src changes.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides loading skeletons, error alerts, and empty state UI components for data queries.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header navigation, cart indicator, footer, and content container.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting users to enter their name and save their profile via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication state, login, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDetail.ts: Hooks to load order status and order items from the backend using an order ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Fetches the authenticated user's orders, currently returning an empty list until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: Mutation hook to place an order and invalidate order-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurant.ts: Hooks to fetch a restaurant and its menu from the backend by restaurant ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurants.ts: Fetches and returns a list of all restaurants from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining color themes plus global background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Handles cart display, item quantity updates, and checkout flow including authentication and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays order status and items with refresh, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersListPage.tsx: Lists the user's past orders with status, total amount, and navigation to order details.
Shows restaurant details and menu items, supports adding items to cart with quantity controls and validations.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantsListPage.t: Displays a grid of restaurants with images and descriptions, allowing navigation to each restaurant's menu.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats numbers or BigInts into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Extracts a human-readable message from various error types safely.
frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts: Defines fallback image paths and a large dish-name-to-image map pointing menu item names to generated asset filenames.
frontend/src/utils/restaurantId.ts: Parses a restaurant ID string into a positive bigint and returns either a valid ID or an error message.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, image requirements, and feature requests for updating Sakthi Snacks image assets.
